description: Crash simulation involves modeling and analyzing the behavior of vehicles and barriers during a collision to improve safety designs. It helps engineers evaluate the effectiveness of safety features and barriers in real-world scenarios.
you_have_this_if: You are working on vehicle safety design.
You need to test the impact of different barrier designs.
You require rapid iterations for design modifications.
You are involved in regulatory compliance for safety standards.

approaches.best_for: Evaluating new safety barrier designs and conducting rapid simulations for design iterations.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Provides realistic simulations but may require significant computational resources.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need detailed and realistic simulations of crash scenarios for safety evaluations.

start_here: Start with Soft-Body physics simulation as it provides a comprehensive approach to crash simulations, allowing for accurate modeling of vehicle and barrier interactions.
